PLAY.TITLE: The History of Troilus and Cressida

PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae
PERSONAE.PERSONA: MARGARELON, a bastard son of Priam.
CALCHAS, a Trojan priest, taking part with the Greeks.
THERSITES, a deformed and scurrilous Grecian.
CASSANDRA, daughter to Priam, a prophetess.
Trojan and Greek Soldiers, and Attendants.

PLAY.SCNDESCR: SCENE Troy, and the Grecian camp before it.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Troy. Before Priam's palace.
SCENE II. The Same. A street.
SCENE III. The Grecian camp. Before Agamemnon's tent.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Sennet. Enter AGAMEMNON, NESTOR, ULYSSES,
MENELAUS, and others
Exeunt all but ULYSSES and NESTOR

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. A part of the Grecian camp.
SCENE II. Troy. A room in Priam's palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter PRIAM, HECTOR, TROILUS, PARIS, and HELENUS

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. The Grecian camp. Before Achilles' tent.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter AGAMEMNON, ULYSSES, NESTOR, DIOMEDES, and AJAX

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Troy. Priam's palace.
SCENE II. The same. Pandarus' orchard.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter PANDARUS and Troilus's Boy, meeting

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. The Grecian camp. Before Achilles' tent.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter AGAMEMNON, ULYSSES, DIOMEDES, NESTOR, AJAX,
MENELAUS, and CALCHAS
Enter ACHILLES and PATROCLUS, before their tent

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Troy. A street.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter, from one side, AENEAS, and Servant with a
torch; from the other, PARIS, DEIPHOBUS, ANTENOR,
DIOMEDES, and others, with torches

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The same. Court of Pandarus' house.
SCENE III. The same. Street before Pandarus' house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter PARIS, TROILUS, AENEAS, DEIPHOBUS, ANTENOR,
and DIOMEDES

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. The same. Pandarus' house.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: TROILUS
SPEECH.STAGEDIR:
Enter AENEAS, PARIS, ANTENOR, DEIPHOBUS,
and DIOMEDES

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. The Grecian camp. Lists set out.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter AJAX, armed; AGAMEMNON, ACHILLES, PATROCLUS,
MENELAUS, ULYSSES, NESTOR, and others

Enter HECTOR, armed; AENEAS, TROILUS, and other
Trojans, with Attendants
AJAX and HECTOR enter the lists
Exeunt all except TROILUS and ULYSSES

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. The Grecian camp. Before Achilles' tent.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter HECTOR, TROILUS, AJAX, AGAMEMNON, ULYSSES,
NESTOR, MENELAUS, and DIOMEDES, with lights
Exit DIOMEDES; ULYSSES and TROILUS following
Exeunt ACHILLES, HECTOR, AJAX, and NESTOR

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The same. Before Calchas' tent.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter TROILUS and ULYSSES, at a distance;
after them, THERSITES

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. Troy. Before Priam's palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Exeunt severally PRIAM and HECTOR. Alarums

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. Plains between Troy and the Grecian camp.
SCENE V. Another part of the plains.
SCENE VI. Another part of the plains.
SCENE VII. Another part of the plains.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter MENELAUS and PARIS, fighting:
then THERSITES

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VIII. Another part of the plains.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Puts off his helmet and hangs his shield
behind him

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IX. Another part of the plains.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter AGAMEMNON, AJAX, MENELAUS, NESTOR, DIOMEDES,
and others, marching. Shouts within

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE X . Another part of the plains.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
As TROILUS is going out, enter, from the other
side, PANDARUS
